How to Connect to the ToolCase:
1. Make sure your device\'s Bluetooth is on.
2. Makes sure that the toolbox is switched on and has batteries in it.
3. Open your Bluetooth menu to select the "HC-05" network and enter the password (1234).
4. Wait for the status inside the app to say "Connected to ToolCase".
If you encounter issues, restart your device and try again.

TroubleShooting

Bluetooth network "HC-05" does not appear:
If the "HC-05" Network does not appear in your bluetooth page, here are a couple things you may want to try:
1. Try turning the Toolbox off and on again.
2. Replace the batteries in the ToolCase.
3. Restart your app and or your phone.
